title: 161.37 SURPLUS GOVERNMENT MATERIALS.
text:
The commissioner may accept from the federal government allotments to the state of excess materials suitable for road construction and maintenance purposes.
Costs incurred in receiving, placing in use, delivering, or purchasing spare parts for excess materials shall be paid out of the trunk highway fund; provided that any expense so incurred in receiving, delivering, or purchasing spare parts for the material in behalf of any county shall be paid by the county, and payment received therefor shall be credited to the trunk highway fund.
